name: You're Going To Be Fine (Branches)
description:
You're Going To Be Fine (Branches) is a companion game to Let Her Leave (Roots) and is a short, linear text game built in Twine. 

A young woman runs through the forest, trying desperately to escape her beast of a girlfriend; her fairy tale nightmare. Her mind is foggy, her throat is sore, and the road ahead is long and treacherous. 

Will you escape? Will you find the way out of these tangled woods? Will you ever breathe easy again?

You're going to be fine.
